info.name: Suivi et Gestion de Ruchers - Auth (Django + Hasura)
info.description: Register: email, password, nom, prenom. Login: JWT Hasura. POST /api/entreprise (créer entreprise, user connecté = AdminEntreprise). POST /api/auth/accept-invitation (token) pour rejoindre une entreprise. Hasura pour invitations/ruchers.

body.raw: {"query":"query { ruchers { id created_at updated_at nom latitude longitude flore altitude notes entreprise { id nom adresse } ruches_aggregate { aggregate { count } } } }"}

{"query":"query($id: uuid!) { ruchers_by_pk(id: $id) { id created_at updated_at nom latitude longitude flore altitude notes entreprise { id nom adresse } ruches_aggregate { aggregate { count } } } }","variables":{"id":"{{rucherId}}"}}

{"query":"mutation($object: ruchers_insert_input!) { insert_ruchers_one(object: $object) { id created_at updated_at } }","variables":{"object":{"nom":"Rucher Postman","latitude":48.8566,"longitude":2.3522,"flore":"ToutesFleurs","altitude":35,"notes":"Créé depuis Postman","entreprise_id":"{{entrepriseId}}"}}}

{"query":"mutation($id: uuid!, $changes: ruchers_set_input!) { update_ruchers_by_pk(pk_columns: {id: $id}, _set: $changes) { id created_at updated_at nom notes } }","variables":{"id":"{{rucherId}}","changes":{"notes":"Modifié depuis Postman"}}}
{"query":"query { ruches { id created_at updated_at immatriculation type race statut maladie securisee rucher { id nom } reine { id } } }"}
{"query":"query($id: uuid!) { ruches_by_pk(id: $id) { id created_at updated_at immatriculation type race statut maladie securisee rucher { id nom } } }","variables":{"id":"{{rucheId}}"}}

{"query":"mutation($id: uuid!, $changes: ruches_set_input!) { update_ruches_by_pk(pk_columns: {id: $id}, _set: $changes) { id created_at updated_at immatriculation statut maladie securisee } }","variables":{"id":"{{rucheId}}","changes":{"securisee":true,"maladie":"Varroose"}}}

{"query":"query { reines { id created_at updated_at anneeNaissance codeCouleur lignee noteDouceur commentaire nonReproductible isElevage statut entreprise { id nom adresse } ruche { id immatriculation } cycles_elevage_reines { id dateDebut dateFin statut taches_cycle_elevages { id type jourTheorique datePrevue dateRealisee statut commentaire } } } }"}

{"query":"query($id: uuid!) { reines_by_pk(id: $id) { id created_at updated_at anneeNaissance codeCouleur lignee noteDouceur commentaire nonReproductible isElevage statut entreprise { id nom adresse } ruche { id immatriculation } cycles_elevage_reines { id dateDebut dateFin statut taches_cycle_elevages { id type jourTheorique datePrevue dateRealisee statut commentaire } } } }","variables":{"id":"{{reineId}}"}}

{"query":"mutation($object: reines_insert_input!) { insert_reines_one(object: $object) { id created_at updated_at } }","variables":{"object":{"entreprise_id":"{{entrepriseId}}","ruche_id":null,"anneeNaissance":2022,"codeCouleur":"Jaune","lignee":"Buckfast","noteDouceur":8,"commentaire":"Créée depuis Postman","nonReproductible":false,"isElevage":true,"statut":"Fecondee"}}}

{"query":"mutation($id: uuid!, $changes: reines_set_input!) { update_reines_by_pk(pk_columns: {id: $id}, _set: $changes) { id created_at updated_at codeCouleur lignee noteDouceur isElevage statut entreprise { id nom } ruche { id immatriculation } } }","variables":{"id":"{{reineId}}","changes":{"codeCouleur":"Rouge","lignee":"Carnica","noteDouceur":9,"statut":"DisponibleVente"}}}
{"query":"query { cycles_elevage_reines { id created_at updated_at dateDebut dateFin statut reine { id } } }"}

{"query":"query($id: uuid!) { cycles_elevage_reines_by_pk(id: $id) { id created_at updated_at dateDebut dateFin statut reine { id } taches_cycle_elevages { id type jourTheorique datePrevue dateRealisee statut commentaire } } }","variables":{"id":"{{cycleElevageId}}"}}

{"query":"mutation($id: uuid!, $changes: cycles_elevage_reines_set_input!) { update_cycles_elevage_reines_by_pk(pk_columns: {id: $id}, _set: $changes) { id created_at updated_at dateDebut dateFin statut } }","variables":{"id":"{{cycleElevageId}}","changes":{"statut":"Termine","dateFin":"2026-03-01"}}}
{"query":"query { taches_cycle_elevage { id created_at updated_at cycle_id type jourTheorique datePrevue dateRealisee statut commentaire } }"}

{"query":"query($id: uuid!) { taches_cycle_elevage_by_pk(id: $id) { id created_at updated_at cycle_id type jourTheorique datePrevue dateRealisee statut commentaire } }","variables":{"id":"{{tacheCycleId}}"}}

{"query":"mutation($id: uuid!, $changes: taches_cycle_elevage_set_input!) { update_taches_cycle_elevage_by_pk(pk_columns: {id: $id}, _set: $changes) { id created_at updated_at cycle_id type jourTheorique datePrevue dateRealisee statut commentaire } }","variables":{"id":"{{tacheCycleId}}","changes":{"statut":"Faite","dateRealisee":"2026-02-10"}}}
{"query":"query { interventions(where: {type: {_eq: \"Traitement\"}}) { id created_at updated_at type date observations produit dosage ruche { id immatriculation } } }"}
{"query":"query($id: uuid!) { interventions_by_pk(id: $id) { id created_at updated_at type date observations produit dosage ruche { id immatriculation } } }","variables":{"id":"{{traitementId}}"}}

{"query":"mutation($object: interventions_insert_input!) { insert_interventions_one(object: $object) { id created_at updated_at } }","variables":{"object":{"type":"Traitement","date":"2026-02-05","observations":"Traitement anti-varroa","produit":"Acide oxalique","dosage":"5 ml","ruche_id":"{{rucheId}}"}}}

{"query":"mutation($id: uuid!, $changes: interventions_set_input!) { update_interventions_by_pk(pk_columns: {id: $id}, _set: $changes) { id created_at updated_at type date observations produit dosage } }","variables":{"id":"{{traitementId}}","changes":{"observations":"Traitement terminé","dosage":"6 ml"}}}
{"query":"query { transhumances { id created_at updated_at date origineLat origineLng destinationLat destinationLng floreCible rucher { id nom } } }"}

{"query":"query($id: uuid!) { transhumances_by_pk(id: $id) { id created_at updated_at date origineLat origineLng destinationLat destinationLng floreCible rucher { id nom } } }","variables":{"id":"{{transhumenceId}}"}}

{"query":"mutation($id: uuid!, $changes: transhumances_set_input!) { update_transhumances_by_pk(pk_columns: {id: $id}, _set: $changes) { id created_at updated_at date origineLat origineLng destinationLat destinationLng floreCible } }","variables":{"id":"{{transhumenceId}}","changes":{"destinationLat":45.7640,"destinationLng":4.8357,"floreCible":"ToutesFleurs"}}}

{"query":"mutation($object: entreprises_insert_input!) { insert_entreprises_one(object: $object) { id created_at updated_at nom adresse } }","variables":{"object":{"nom":"Mon Rucher SARL","adresse":"123 rue des Abeilles"}}}
